context: How are you doing today? Can you recommend some movies to watch? I can watch any genre as long as the movie is actually and hold my interest
Good. Sure what kind do you like? Animation, Ferdinand (2017) was great Ferdinand (2017) was great. The Shape of Water (2017) was great. Dunkirk (2017) was great and I really liked The Witch (2015)
I actually haven't seen any of those you liked them? my fav is Fight Club (1999)
I did! Surprisingly, I liked Ferdinand (2017) and I don't usually care for animated flicks
Well, thank you for all of the recommendations!
resp: I did, I liked Ferdinand (2017) and I don't like animated flics
